projects.title: Projects
projects.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project? All conversations will be deleted.
projects.emptyState: No projects yet. Create your first project to get started.

conversations.title: Conversations
conversations.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? All messages will be deleted.
conversations.emptyState: No conversations yet. Start a new conversation to begin chatting.

chat.title: Chat
chat.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.
chat.emptyState: Start a conversation by typing a message below.

documents.title: Documents
documents.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this document?

documents.dragDrop: Drag and drop files here, or click to select
documents.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, DOCX, TXT, MD

multiDocChat.title: Multi-Document Chat
multiDocChat.description: Ask the same question to multiple documents and compare their answers side-by-side
multiDocChat.chooseDocuments: Choose up to 10 documents to query
multiDocChat.askAnything: Ask anything about the selected documents
multiDocChat.placeholder: What are the main findings regarding...
multiDocChat.noHistory: No history yet. Submit a query to get started.
multiDocChat.noResults: No results yet. Select documents and ask a question to get started.

settings.title: Settings
settings.general: Manage your application preferences and defaults
settings.defaultModelDescription: Set default AI model preferences for new conversations
settings.providerDescription: Choose between OpenAI (GPT) or Anthropic (Claude) models
settings.selectModelDescription: Select which model to use by default for new conversations
settings.temperatureDescription: Higher values make output more random, lower values more focused (0-2)
settings.maxTokensDescription: Maximum number of tokens to generate (1-100,000)
settings.themeDescription: Customize the appearance of the application
settings.themeChoice: Choose your preferred theme or follow system settings
settings.languageDescription: Set your preferred language for the interface
settings.languageChoice: Choose your preferred language for the user interface

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.forbidden: You don't have permission to access this resource.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.validation: Please check your input and try again.

batchQuestioning.title: Batch Questioning
batchQuestioning.description: Ask multiple questions to a single document and get comprehensive answers

setup.title: Setup Batch Questions
setup.description: Select a document and enter multiple questions to analyze it comprehensively

emptyState.title: No Results Yet
emptyState.description: Select a document and add questions to start batch processing. You can ask multiple questions at once to efficiently analyze your documents.

errors.noQuestions: Please add at least one question

history.empty: No history yet. Process some batch questions to see them here.

templates.title: Question Templates
templates.empty: No templates found for this category

deepAgent.title: Deep Agent
deepAgent.description: Run specialized AI agents for comprehensive document analysis
deepAgent.noHistory: No agent runs yet. Start by running an agent on a document.

configuration.title: Agent Configuration
configuration.description: Select an agent and document to start comprehensive analysis
configuration.queryPlaceholder: Enter a custom query or leave empty to use the agent's default...
configuration.queryHint: If left empty, the agent will use its default query template
configuration.noDocuments: No completed documents available. Please upload and process a document first.

login.title: Sign In
login.description: Enter your credentials to access the application

errors.failed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.

auth.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.

disclaimer.title: Welcome
disclaimer.subtitle: Please read and accept the terms to continue
disclaimer.description1: AI Assistant is a document chat application powered by AI that helps you analyze documents and have intelligent conversations. You can upload documents and ask questions about them. This application uses third-party large language models, so confidential information should not be uploaded.
disclaimer.confidentialityWarning: The application maintainers decline all responsibilities about the potential dissemination of information if confidential information is uploaded into the tool.
disclaimer.disclaimer: The application does not warrant the accuracy of responses and information extracted and cannot be held responsible for any inaccuracies or mistakes made using this tool.
disclaimer.documentation: You can chat with your uploaded documents and get insights using advanced AI capabilities.
disclaimer.consent: By clicking on the below, you agree to be informed and accept the above limitations.
disclaimer.memoryNote: This application maintains conversation history within each chat session.
disclaimer.feedback: Please share your feedback with the development team.
disclaimer.limitations: Usage limits may apply depending on your subscription tier.
disclaimer.acceptError: Failed to accept terms. Please try again.
